titleStmt.title: The discription of a rare or rather most monstrous fishe taken on the east cost of Holland the. xvii. of Nouember, anno 1566 The workes of God how great and straunge they be a picture plaine behold heare may you see.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Pawles Churchyarde by Thomas Purfoote at the signe of the Lucrece,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
